original_text: For thus says the Lord of hosts: “As I purposed to bring disaster to you when your fathers provoked me to wrath, and I did not relent, says the Lord of hosts,
korean_text: 만군의 여호와가 이같이 말하노라 너희 조상들이 나를 격노하게 하였을 때에 내가 그들에게 재앙을 내리기로 뜻하고 뉘우치지 아니하였으나

sentences.original_text: For thus says the Lord of hosts:
As I purposed to bring disaster to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 재앙을 내리기로 작정했던 것처럼

sentences.original_text: when your fathers provoked me to wrath,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 조상들이 나를 격노케 했을 때에
